name: Safari 15 browser mockup
description:
Safari 15 browser mockup

I always screenshot safari and make assets for Thursday, so I thought let me just sit down and make a figma version.


  • Multiple tabs
  • Light/Dark mode toggles
  • Pinned tabs
  • Custom address bar colors
  • Custom desktop wallpaper


Special thanks to @joeybanks for his macOS 12 monterey figma kit :)
